Tuluum Shimmering.title: People and Music Series Volume 2: CD 1, 1950s Moroccan Field Recordings
Tuluum Shimmering.about:
Tuluum Shimmering Records TSR016 CD1
Part of a now out of print 4 CD-r boxed set (This CD of Moroccan field recordings plus 3 CDs of Tuluum Shimmering recordings incorporating sounds from the field recordings).
For more information about the music on this CD of 1950s Moroccan field recordings, please consult the liner notes included when you download the album. Please note this CD is available to download for free.

Tuluum Shimmering.title: The Frimley Embankment Tapes
Tuluum Shimmering.about: A few days ago a package arrived at Tuluum Shimmering Records HQ in a plain mailer with no return address. It contained only a vintage reel of audio tape in its box, along with a loose slightly crumpled picture of a train with hand drawn lettering reading "FRIMLEY EMBANKMENT". The tape itself is marked "FRIMLEY 1-8-72 MONO". It would appear to be a raw audio document of a studio session by a band called Frimley Embankment in 1972. I can find no information about any group of this name, so all we can go on at this point is the internal evidence on the tape. From the accents the group would appear to be from the south west of England. Hampshire, and more particularly the Andover region seem a possibility. If anyone has any information about the group, or indeed knows the current whereabouts of any of its members, we at TSR would love to know. The tape is here presented in full. Sincerest thanks to our mystery benefactor.

trackinfo.title: Raw studio recordings August 1st 1972 (Warning: contains strong language)
trackinfo.credits: from The Frimley Embankment Tapes, released March 14, 2019
